channel.title: Help making command
channel.description:
can any1 tell me how to make simple commands that give u stuff like ::cash - 20m + it sends a message saying blah blah? :)
Thanks Dominate

item.title: Help making command
item.dc:creator: @TupacScape_Owner TupacScape Owner
item.description:
@TupacScape_Owner wrote:

no you must put it in client.java

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2007, 04:01:08 AM[/size][hr][quote=“bug, post:2, topic:167092”]if(command.startsWith("cash") { addItem(995, 20000000); sendMessage("your text");
}

OR if you want to send the message to all players do:

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "your text";

Open client.java
CTRL+F search for

if(command.startsWith("

add this by the other commands:

if(command.startsWith("cash") { addItem(995, 20000000); sendMessage("your text");}

OR if you want to send the message to all players do:

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "your text";

G-Yiffa

Read full topic

item.title: Help making command
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

if(command.startsWith("cash") { addItem(995, 20000000); sendMessage("your text");
}

OR if you want to send the message to all players do:

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "your text";
